attributes.action: offer a referendum regarding the EU treaty to the British public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is the Prime Minister, not a dictator. He has to ask the permission from the pubic he represents to enter into any new treaty. He has no right to do so without permission. If he continues to do what he wants without consulting the wishes of the people whose lives will be affected by the treaty his party should reconsider their choice of leader.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
